CustomDataType.description: This class does not get 'AdditionalProperties = false' in the schema generation, so it can be extended with arbitrary JSON properties to allow adding custom data.

MessageFormatEnumType.description:
Message_ Content. Format. Message_ Format_ Code
urn:x-enexis:ecdm:uid:1:570848
Format of the message.

MessagePriorityEnumType.description:
Message_ Info. Priority. Message_ Priority_ Code
urn:x-enexis:ecdm:uid:1:569253
With what priority should this message be shown

MessageStateEnumType.description:
Message_ Info. State. Message_ State_ Code
urn:x-enexis:ecdm:uid:1:569254
During what state should this message be shown. When omitted this message should be shown in any state of the Charging Station.

name.description: Name of the component. Name should be taken from the list of standardized component names whenever possible. Case Insensitive. strongly advised to use Camel Case.

instance.description: Name of instance in case the component exists as multiple instances. Case Insensitive. strongly advised to use Camel Case.

EVSEType.description:
EVSE

Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment

id.description:
Identified_ Object. MRID. Numeric_ Identifier
urn:x-enexis:ecdm:uid:1:569198
EVSE Identifier. This contains a number (> 0) designating an EVSE of the Charging Station.

connectorId.description: An id to designate a specific connector (on an EVSE) by connector index number.

Message language identifier. Contains a language code as defined in <<ref-RFC5646,[RFC5646]>>.

content.description:

MessageInfoType.description:
Message_ Info
urn:x-enexis:ecdm:uid:2:233264
Contains message details, for a message to be displayed on a Charging Station.

id.description:
Identified_ Object. MRID. Numeric_ Identifier
urn:x-enexis:ecdm:uid:1:569198
Master resource identifier, unique within an exchange context. It is defined within the OCPP context as a positive Integer value (greater or equal to zero).

startDateTime.description:
Message_ Info. Start. Date_ Time
urn:x-enexis:ecdm:uid:1:569256
From what date-time should this message be shown. If omitted: directly.

endDateTime.description:
Message_ Info. End. Date_ Time
urn:x-enexis:ecdm:uid:1:569257
Until what date-time should this message be shown, after this date/time this message SHALL be removed.

transactionId.description:
During which transaction shall this message be shown.
Message SHALL be removed by the Charging Station after transaction has
ended.
